Under the cloak of struggling for minority and human rights, the so-called National Liberation Army (NLA) ─ whose structure, command and control and logistics are of Kosovo provenance ─ wanted to realize one aim: the division of Macedonia and changing the borders in the region. to Our response those attacks was military, political and diplomatic.
